participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, loves animals and nature.
participant_1.background: I fell and sprained my ankle while hiking last year. My parents would take my brother and I when we were little. My glasses are always dirty and I cannot seem to get them clean. I played fetch with my black lab in the park today. I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Creative and optimistic, enjoys music and sports.
participant_2.background: I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up. I have to wear a beanie to play soccer in the cold weather, but I still love it. I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day. I drive a silver Lexus. I'm currently looking for a job in Baltimore.

content.text: What\'s up!
Hey! Not much, just woke up and playing piano. How about you?
Just woke up myself. Had to take my dog to the park.
Aw, what kind of dog do you have?
I have a black lab named Buddy. He's the best!
Aww, I love black labs! I used to have one named Buddy too. He was the best dog ever.
That's awesome! I'm so glad you had a good dog experience.
Me too. Dogs are the best!
I agree. They're always happy to see you and they're always there for you.
Exactly! They're the best companions.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm currently looking for a job in Baltimore.
Oh, cool. What kind of job are you looking for?
Anything that's in my field, really. I'm a software engineer.
Oh, cool! I'm a software engineer too.
Really? That's awesome! What kind of software do you work on?
I mostly work on web applications.
Me too! We should connect.
For sure! I'll send you my info.
Sounds good
